options.content: High-Availability Zonal Load Balancing (HAZL) Dashboard

binary.left: sum (   sum(     rate(       outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{         cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""       }[1m]     )     +     rate(       outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{         cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""       }[1m]     )   ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)   * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)   (     sum(       container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}     ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)     * 0 + 1   )   unless ignoring(matching_zone)   (     label_replace(       sum(         rate(           outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )         +         rate(           outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )       ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)       * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)       (         sum(           container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}         ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)         * 0 + 1       ),       "matching_zone",       "$1",       "topology_kubernetes_io_zone",       "(.*)"     )     ==     label_replace(       sum(         rate(           outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )         +         rate(           outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )       ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)       * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)       (         sum(           container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}         ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)         * 0 + 1       ),       "matching_zone",       "$1",       "dst_zone",       "(.*)"     )   ) )

sum (   sum(     rate(       outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{         cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""       }[1m]     )     +     rate(       outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{         cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""       }[1m]     )   ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)   * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)   (     sum(       container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}     ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)     * 0 + 1   )   unless ignoring(matching_zone)   (     label_replace(       sum(         rate(           outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )         +         rate(           outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )       ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)       * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)       (         sum(           container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}         ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)         * 0 + 1       ),       "matching_zone",       "$1",       "topology_kubernetes_io_zone",       "(.*)"     )     ==     label_replace(       sum(         rate(           outbound_tcp_write_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )         +         rate(           outbound_tcp_read_bytes_total{             cluster_name="$cluster_name", tls="true", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics",peer="dst", dst_zone!=""           }[1m]         )       ) by (namespace, workload_name, pod, instance, dst_namespace, dst_workload_name, dst_pod, dst_zone)       * on (pod) group_left (topology_kubernetes_io_zone)       (         sum(           container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster_name="$cluster_name", container="linkerd-proxy"}         ) by (pod, topology_kubernetes_io_zone)         * 0 + 1       ),       "matching_zone",       "$1",       "dst_zone",       "(.*)"     )   ) )

targets.expr:
sum(rate(outbound_response_total{classification="success", namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics", workload_name=~"$client_workload"}[1m])) by (workload_name)
/
sum(rate(outbound_response_total{namespace=~"$client_namespace", workload_name!="buoyant-cloud-metrics", workload_name=~"$client_workload"}[1m])) by (workload_name)
